table.name: vtiger_recordcreator
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_recordcreator` ( `recordcreator_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `primary_module_name` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `target_module_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `target_module_view` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `displaytext` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `linkid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`recordcreator_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_recordcreator_mapping
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_recordcreator_mapping` ( `fieldmappingid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `primary_field` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `target_field` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `recordcreator_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`fieldmappingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
